title: Luminara Flicker Pillar Candles at Bed Bath & Beyond
description:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/luminara-trade-led-flicker-pillar-candle-in-ivory/3258234?
The realistic light of the Luminara LED Flicker Candle moves and dances, creating a unique flickering flame effect. Produced using electromagnetics and LED lights, this candle is designed to be used everywhere by everyone. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/luminara-trade-led-flicker-pillar-candle-in-ivory/3258234?
The realistic light of the Luminara LED Flicker Candle moves and dances, creating a unique flickering flame effect. Produced using electromagnetics and LED lights, this candle is designed to be used everywhere by everyone. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Luminara flame-less candles are battery operated and have a beautiful real flame affect. They're made of real wax, not plastic, and Luminara's LED system works to create a flame-less light that dances and flickers just like a real candle. They come in both 5 inch and 7 inch pillars. Each candle uses 2 D batteries and will last up to 500 hours. Place them anywhere in your home. Set the built in 5 hours timer feature and they will turn on at the same time everyday. The candles are also remote ready. The remote is sold separately. They have a mild vanilla scent. Because they are flame-less they're safe around children and pets. These candles are perfect for parties, and they look great grouped together. Especially when you mix the different sizes. If you're looking for worry free beautiful candles to illuminate your home just like real candles these flame-less wax candles are the perfect choice. The Luminara flame-less candles are available online and at a Bed Bath and Beyond store near you.
